</div>

<br />

<div align="center">
  <h3>AdonisJS Env Provider</h3>
  <p>Provider to parse and load environment variables from a local <code>.env</code> file. Comes with first class support for <strong>variables substitution</strong>.</p>
</div>

<br />

</div>
